definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shut the eyes (NH Hiph.; poss. connex. with Syr. 9mas. = id., Ar. gamad.a, IV (on gamud.a = d. v. Nö:ZMG xxxii (1878), 406); NH [[עִמֵּץ]] close eyes of dead; cf. Ba:ES 5f.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[וְעׂחֵם עֵינׇיו מִן]] Is 33:15 shutteth his eyes from seeing

definitions.title: Pi
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיְעַצֵּם אֶת־עֵינֵיכֶם]] Is 29:10 he hath tightly shut your eyes (cf. I. [[עחה]]).
